Question
========

The number of ecs obtained by economics students during the first three years of their studies is normally distributed with mean 150 and standard deviation 15. Student Sandra B. earned 165 ecs. What percentage of students obtained fewer ecs than Sandra?

Answerlist
----------

* 84%
* 91%
* 98%

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 84%: Correct
* 91%: Incorrect
* 98%: Incorrect
